text: Razve ty ne vidish', chto Allakh rasseivayet oblaka, potom sgonyayet ikh vmeste, zatem obrashchayet v tuchi, iz kotorykh, kak ty vidish', nispadayet liven'. I On nizvergayet s neba gory tuch, polnykh grada, porazhayet im, kogo zakhochet, i otgonyayet, ot kogo zakhochet. Blesk Yego molniy chut' li ne osleplyayet [lyudey]
